com.jwetherell.motion_detection.detection

Class LumaMotionDetection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jwetherell.motion_detection.detection.LumaMotionDetection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMotionDetection

    public class LumaMotionDetection
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMotionDetection
    This class is used to process integer arrays containing Luma data and detects motion.
    Author:
    Justin Wetherell
